title: Topic 001 Question 080
body: You plan to use an Azure Data Lake Storage Gen2 account to implement a Data Lake development environment that meets the following requirements:
•	Read and write access to data must be maintained if an availability zone becomes unavailable.
•	Data that was last modified more than two years ago must be deleted automatically.
What should you configure? To answer, select the appropriate options in the answer area.
NOTE: Each correct selection is worth one point.
